page.title: 02Education
page.content: Educational System Children commence the Nursery Class at 3 yrs. This is held on Wednesday mornings at Netherton.Children attend Netherton School part-time during the term before they commence full-time education.Those with birthdays Sept. - Apr.are part-time previous Summer Term and those May- Aug.are part-time in the Autumn Term.Sometimes these children commence earlier if they are mature enough. At the age of 9 years all the children transfer to the Middle School at Rothbury,where they are joined by children from Harbottle, Thropton, Rothbury and Newton-on-the-Moor First Schools. At the age of 13 they transfer to the High School at Morpeth, which at present has over 1200 pupils. Some children enter Private Education.
